clauses.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: However, we have the right—but no duty—to review and remove files for any reason

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: ou and SpiderOak agree to resolve any claim against each other through final and binding arbitration, including claims against SpiderOak affiliates, officers, directors, employees and agents, and SpiderOak affiliates’ officers, directors, employees and agents.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If all or part of SpiderOak is sold, merged, or otherwise transferred to another company in the future, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We may share your information with third-party services helping us provide our products and services.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: The files and other materials you upload to the SpiderOak Services are yours and yours alone

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: SpiderOak cannot decrypt your files
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).
clauses.clause_text:
If we are going to release your information, our policy is to provide you with notice unless we are prohibited from doing so by law or court order (e.g., an order under 18 U.S.C.
§ 2705(b)).

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text:
We welcome all questions, concerns, and feedback you might have about these Terms.
If you have suggestions for us, please contact our customer success team.</p

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
clauses.description: You have the right to send a counter-notice to the service if you believe the content that was removed wasn't infringing any copyright.
clauses.clause_text:
It also explains how the person who posted the content can oppose a notice of alleged infringement by submitting a counter-notice.

Please think carefully before sending us a copyright notice or counter-notice, because the DMCA imposes legal and financial penalties for making fraudulent or bad-faith claims.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

clauses.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: When you create a SpiderOak account, we ask you to choose a username and passphrase. You may use your email address as your username, but it’s not required.

clauses.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified a week in advance.
clauses.description: Users will be notified a week before the Terms are somehow updated, which lets them a reasonable amount of time to carefully read the changes and perhaps stop using the services if they do not longer agree.
clauses.clause_text: If we make changes that we believe will substantially alter your rights, we will post the revisions 7 days before they take effect so you can review them.

case.text: When the service wants to change its terms, you are notified a week or more in advance.

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: no refund policy
clauses.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.
clauses.clause_text: "SpiderOak will not make any refunds of any payments made by you."

case.text: The service has a no refund policy

clauses.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text: To send us a notice concerning copyright infringement, you’ll need to provide the following information:

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: With third parties helping us provide SpiderOak

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
